about_the_game:
You played Obsession. You know what you're in for by now, right? You were warned. Repeatedly.

This game is not for the light-hearted. This is not a happy, fluffy, feel-good game. Do not play this game if you are easily or moderately offendable. These boys are not recommended for those with morals, standards, or humanity. Leave your conscience at the door.

You will need to unlock and complete the secret character in the main game to play some endings in this DLC.

Game Features:

This DLC adds a new route for Alexander Dallarosa, the free-spirit, hedonistic, polygamous, selfish, cocky, perverted, vulgar, mafia BDSM playboy. He is the identical twin to your supposed soulmate, Sebastian.

Will Alexander ever believe in love? What exactly does he believe in?

This is an unobserved timeline, separate from the main game. You'll finally have a little privacy from those nosy Ethereals!

Alexander's route contains:
  • 92,572 new words, an additional > 7 hours of play time (at 200wpm reading speed)
  • 12 endings
  • 13 unique CGs (variations not included)
  • Side Stories about other events not included in the main route
  • Mini stories that reveal history and details of the characters
  • What-If Scenarios to explore possible alternate realities with happier endings... maybe...
  • Walkthrough that details how to unlock all content
  • CG Gallery
  • Clearly marked dialog-only choices, no guessing required!

Maybe here you can find your happy ending? I guess you haven't learned your lesson yet. Well, good luck. You'll need it.

content_descriptors.notes:
Trigger warnings are available per character route in-game. Please review these warnings before playing each character, as the mature content can vary per route.

This game includes content regarding child abuse, gun and physical violence, kidnapping, physical and mental and emotional and sexual abuse, stalking, incest, mental illness, suicide, imprisonment, BDSM, murder, sexism, homophobia, bullying, sex, nudity, self-harm, and more.

This game is not for the light-hearted or those easily offended or sensitive.

short_description: You are a troubled college student trying to live a normal life surrounded by some... complicated men. Alexander seems like a safe choice, as long as you're open-minded... right?
